metadata.synopsis: Reactivity on the bard tunic mannequin as Shadowheart manages to remember a little bit about it after passing a memory check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Interact with the mannequins

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: This tunic... I'm sure I wore it. Did I have to disguise myself as a bard?
1.context: NodeContext: Half-remembering something from her training.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Hells, did I have to sing? The things I did for Lady Shar...
0.context: NodeContext: A little mortified. Shar and Enemy of Shar line variants.
